languages.text: The wielder of this staff (power level 8) gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}

traits.locale_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 8) gains the Emperor's Wrath ability. The ability is also available in its heroic act and desperate measure versions. Power level affects the damage of this power. +10 Willpower +5 Fellowship

languages.text: 这根法杖（力量等级8）的使用者获得神皇之怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}

languages.text: この杖の使用者（パワーレベル8）は皇帝の怒り{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に影響を及ぼす。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が+5増加

languages.text: El portador de este báculo (nivel de poder 8) gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Ira del Emperador. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de este poder. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}

languages.text: Der Träger dieses Stabes (Energiestufe 8) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Imperators Zorn. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieser Kraft. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}

languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton (niveau de puissance 8) bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Colère de l'Empereur. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés dépendent du niveau de puissance. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}

languages.text: Bu asayı (güç seviyesi 8) kullanan kişi, İmparator'un Gazabı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetin ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} hâlleri de mevcuttur. Güç seviyesi, bu gücün vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} da etki eder. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g}
